bucket.code_hint: Enter the code, e.g. catalog, shows, news
bucket.name: Name
bucket.name_hint: Enter the name, e.g. Summer Catalog, Music Shows, Latest News

header.title: Add a bucket
header.text: A bucket is a logical unit of storage where you can put your data and make it queryable using best match algorithms, geo capabilities, full-text search, and so on. Inside a bucket the data is stored by language which is provided at sync.

body.text: Choose an easy to remember and concise code. Please note that the code will be used as a reference in the APIs.
